OOC: Okay, okay, I guess i've dragged it out long enough. I like the
idea for the base though, sounds cool.

BIC:

Apeface stood perfectly still on the tree, looking around, taking in
this alien planet. He looked up and saw two birds peacefully fly by.
"YUCK." Apeface said, more brutish than normal. "This planet more gross
than me remember." he finished, as his surroundings began to change. The
tree easily gave way to Tremor's huge form, and began to topple. Apeface
meerly crouched down, his hinges making a loud noise, and then used his
powerful legs, to spring to another tree, as he held on with both feet
and a hand, he looked down. "Watch it." He hollard, as he let himself
slide down the tree. He landed on the ground, beside Tremor. Spasma
opened up a line to the D.E.D ship. 

"Spasma to Scrapper, Spasma to Scrapper." he began, but got frustrated.
"Our commlinks are being jammed, by some type of energon, only the ships
is powerful enough to travel these long distances." he finished, looking
down to Apeface. Apeface looked annoyed.

"Fine." He blurted. "We head back to base, you keep searching." he told
Tremor, as he leapt off of the ground, and transformed. Spasma leapt
off, long enough to land in the cockpit. The ships engines then roared
to life, as he headed back towards MT. Fuji.
______________________________________________________________________

Nightmare finished his salute to Havotron, then walked towards the
chamber, and opened it up. Nothing. For the first time, Nightmare showed
emotion, he was confused. "Computer, what happened to unit Spinister?"
he asked.

Behind Havotron, however, a low exchange of oxygen, could be heard.
"Spinister, reporting." the voice whispered, almost to quietly for
Havotron to hear.
